title: India lays foundation of the ‘country’s largest’ renewable energy park
lead: The 30GW park spreads across 70,000 hectares of land, equivalent to the size of Singapore

title: US solar panel installations predicted to have risen 43% throughout 2020
lead: A record 19GW of new solar capacity has been installed this year, according to a new report

title: Drones to locate abandoned oil and gas wells in New York
lead: The wells release methane, which is many times more potent than carbon dioxide as a greenhouse gas and is second only to CO2 in its overall contribution to climate change

title: US invests $45m in advanced solar technologies research
lead: It is also supporting the creation of a consortium dedicated to developing control technologies for a modernised electric grid

title: Research reveals ways to minimise carbon emissions from Christmas dinner
lead: Around 60% of the climate impact of foods can come from cooking, according to new research

title: Port of New Orleans granted $1.2m for cleaner trucks
lead: The funding will be used to replace certain diesel-powered trucks at port facilities in Orleans, Jefferson and Saint Bernard Parishes with cleaner alternatives

title: ‘Renewables made up almost 46% of German electricity consumption in 2020’
lead: The share of renewables increased by almost 4% compared to last year, according to a report

title: Artist paints a green future for coal mine sludge with pigment creation
lead: Onya McCausland’s ‘Six Bells Red’ line of pigments has been launched at the Coal Authority’s Six Bells mine water treatment scheme in South Wales

title: US energy storage installations skyrocket 240% in third quarter of 2020
lead: The US battery energy storage market is set to soar from 1.2GW in 2020 to nearly 7.5GW in 2025, according to a report

title: Government backs research on the link between nature and mental health
lead: Seven centres will test how to support patients using green activities, including walking and cycling and tree planting
